attribute.name.epicfight.stamina_regen.s: Reduces the amount of time taken for stamina to regen
attribute.name.epicfight.stamina.consume: Requires an indicated amount of stamina to execute
attribute.name.epicfight.cooldown.consum: A cooldown time to activate a skill again
Requires an indicated amount of health to execute
commands.epicfight.skill.add.failed: Não é possível adicionar esta habilidade (Habilidade já adicionada)
commands.epicfight.skill.remove.failed: Não é possível removes esta habilidade (Habilidade inexistente)
commands.epicfight.skill.clear.failed: Alvo não possuí nenhuma habilidade para ser removida
death.attack.wither_beam: %1$s foi vaporizado pelo raio do wither
death.attack.shockwave: %1$s foi explodido por uma Onda de Choque
epicfight.gui.warn_already_registered:
%s
Warning: This items is already registered in the opposing category!
epicfight.gui.tooltip_battle: All items with epic fight attributes will automatically be registered.
epicfight.gui.tooltip_mining: All items excluded from battle mode will automatically be registered.
gamerule.weightPenalty: Penalidade de peso aplicada à Velocidade de Ataque.
gamerule.disableEntityUI: Desativar barra de vida e indicador de alvo para todos os jogadores
gamerule.canSwitchCombat: Permitir a troca entre o modo Batalha/Mineração
gui.epicfight.health_bar_show_option.non: Opção de visualização da barra de vida: Nenhum
gui.epicfight.health_bar_show_option.hur: Opção de visualização da barra de vida: Ferido
gui.epicfight.health_bar_show_option.tar: Opção de visualização da barra de vida: Alvo
gui.epicfight.ui_setup.tooltip: Abrir tela de configuração de UI
gui.epicfight.filter_animation.tooltip: Ligar/desligar o modelo animado no modo de mineração
gui.epicfight.health_bar_show_option.too:
Quais entidades devem ter suas barras de vida visíveis?

Ferido: entidades que estão a baixo da vida máxima.
Alvo: o alvo atual do jogador.
Nenhum: desabilita a barra de vida.
gui.epicfight.long_press_counter.tooltip: Determina quantos cliques levam para reconhecer um pressionamento longo. Usado para habilidades inatas de armas e habilidades evasivas
gui.epicfight.aim_helper.tooltip: Renderiza o auxiliar de mira enquanto mira com um arco ou besta, incompatível com a configuração de gráficos fabulosos e algumas sombras
gui.epicfight.camera_auto_switch.tooltip: Mudar automaticamente para a primeira ou terceira pessoa, ao alternar entre o modo de mineração ou batalha
gui.epicfight.auto_preparation.tooltip: Mudar automaticamente para o modo de batalha quando o jogador for atingido
gui.epicfight.no_mining_in_combat.toolti: Habilitar/Desabilitar a habilidade de mineração no modo de combate
gui.epicfight.aiming_correction.tooltip: Enables/Disables the camera correction when aiming ranged weapons
gui.epicfight.show_attributes.tooltip: Enables/Disables epic fight attributes in item tooltips
gui.epicfight.max_stuck_projectiles.tool: Determines the maximum number of visible projectiles stuck in the player's body in Battle mode.
gui.epicfight.auto_switching_items.toolt: Edite a lista de itens que trocarão automaticamente para o modo de batalha/mineração
gui.epicfight.export_custom_armor.toolti: Exporte todos os modelos de armadura personalizados como um pacote de recursos
gui.epicfight.use_animation_shader.toolt: Turn on/off animation shader. Turning on animation shader enhances the frame rate but may not be compatible with some shader packs
gui.epicfight.use_animation_shader.locke: This option is locked because you're using shader pack that is incompatible. Please reload the shader pack to unlock this option.
gui.epicfight.require_learning: Você precisa aprender a habilidade "%s" primeiro!
gui.epicfight.no_skills: Você não aprendeu nenhuma habilidade ainda! Você pode aprender habilidades adquirindo livros de habilidade matando inimigos ou em baús.
gui.epicfight.select_slot_tooltip: Choose a slot to apply the skill.
item.epicfight.uchigatana.tooltip: Sheathe Uchigatana after 5 seconds of inactivity and your next attack will be empowered.
key.epicfight.show_tooltip: Exibir Descrição da Habilidade Inata da Arma
skill.epicfight.dancing_edge.tooltip: Corte inimigos com uma fatia letal!
skill.epicfight.battojutsu.tooltip: Libere sua lâmina em velocidades supersônicas! Se usado enquanto corre, você corta para frente, cortando inimigos em seu caminho.
skill.epicfight.steel_whirlwind.tooltip: Avance para frente e dizime seus inimigos! Esta habilidade pode ser carregada, aumentando o alcance e velocidade de ataque.
skill.epicfight.the_guillotine.tooltip: Execute seu alvo com um golpe pesado. Executa se o alvo tem menos que %s de vida.
skill.epicfight.heartpiercer.tooltip: Ataque com uma lança rapidamente três vezes.
skill.epicfight.grasping_spire.tooltip: Perfure através de seu inimigo para puxá-los. Atingir com sucesso um inimigo executará um segundo ataque, empurrando-o com base em quantos inimigos foram atingidos.
skill.epicfight.sweeping_edge.tooltip: Abra inimigos próximos com um poderoso corte.
skill.epicfight.rushing_tempo.tooltip: Slash an extra strike at the end of each basic attack. This skill can be stacked by %s times.
skill.epicfight.relentless_combo.tooltip: Libere uma devastadora enxurrada de golpes!
skill.epicfight.liechtenauer.tooltip: Assume a defensive stance for %s seconds. Player can deflect all attacks from in front while attacking. Killing enemies increases defensive stance duration by %s seconds. You cannot sprint while this effect is active.
skill.epicfight.sharp_stab.tooltip: Acompanhe seus ataques com uma perfuração rápida e precisa ignorando a guarda do inimigo.
skill.epicfight.eviscerate.tooltip: Perfure-se no inimigo com um esfaqueamento selvagem. Atingir com sucesso um inimigo irá retirar a adaga, causando dano crítico.
skill.epicfight.blade_rush.tooltip: Corte através de seu inimigo, aplicando Instabilidade por 5 segundos. Alcançar 3 cargas de Instabilidade executará o alvo.
skill.epicfight.wrathful_lighting.toolti: Invoque um relâmpago para prender os inimigos próximos! Tem uma chance de mudar o tempo.
skill.epicfight.tsunami.tooltip: Libere a força das marés e avance para frente! A distância da investida aumenta quando está chovendo ou embaixo d'água.
skill.epicfight.everlasting_allegiance.t: Chame seu tridente lançado, causando dano a todos os inimigos em seu caminho de volta.
skill.epicfight.roll.tooltip: Roll in the direction a player is moving. Evades all incoming attacks.
skill.epicfight.step.tooltip: Slide a short distance in the direction a player is moving. Evades all incoming attacks.
skill.epicfight.guard.tooltip: Right-click to guard against frontal attacks. Continued guarding will consume more stamina.
skill.epicfight.parrying.tooltip: Allows a player to time guards accordingly to prevent stamina use. Player is able to guard against ranged attacks.
skill.epicfight.impact_guard.tooltip: Reduces stamina consumption on guarding. Player can now guard against explosions, fire, magic, and projectiles with %d%% efficiency.
skill.epicfight.berserker.tooltip:
Gain %s%% additional attack damage and %s%% additional attack speed for each 1%% of missing health.

Additional attack speed can't exceed over 5.0
skill.epicfight.stamina_pillager.tooltip: Recupere %s%% da estamina gasta ao matar seu alvo.
skill.epicfight.technician.tooltip: Regain stamina when dodging right before an enemy attack hits a player.
skill.epicfight.hypervitality.tooltip: Uses stamina instead of weapon charge when it's not full.
skill.epicfight.forbidden_strength.toolt: Consumes health instead of stamina when it's insufficient.
skill.epicfight.endurance.tooltip: Grants stun resistance as an amount of stamina consumed for %s seconds if a player is hit while preparing an attack.
skill.epicfight.emergency_escape.tooltip:
Allows a player dodging when out of stamina.

Allows a player canceling attack motions and dodge. (passive)
skill.epicfight.death_harvest.tooltip: Regain innate weapon charge when killing an enemy with an innate weapon skill.
skill.epicfight.meteor_slam.tooltip:
§oApocalypse descended from the sky.§r

Crash into the ground with a powerful slam. Height increases damage done and stamina consumed. Take damage if fall damage exceeds stamina limit.
skill.epicfight.revelation.tooltip:
§oEye of Hawk catching the weakpoints of the enemies§r

Blocking, Parrying, and Dodging gives stacks of Revelation. Reaching the indicated amount of stacks will allow a player to unleash a stunning counter attack.
skill.epicfight.demolition_leap.tooltip: Junte energia para lançar-se em uma direção, reduzindo o dano de queda em 50%.
skill.epicfight.phantom_ascent.tooltip: Allows a player to jump %d times more in the air.
painting.epicfight.epicfight_logo.title: The martial Herobrine
painting.epicfight.epicfight_logo.author: Gui Brabo
pack.epicfight_legacy.title: Epic Fight Legacy
epicfight.tip.weight: Weight shortens stun, raises skill stamina use, and slows attack speed, especially on fast items.
epicfight.tip.stun_armor: Stun Armor extends the time between stuns, boosting overall resilience and defense.
epicfight.tip.knockback: The Knockback enchantment functions to amplify the stun duration upon impact.
epicfight.tip.two_hand_weapon: Two-handed weapons can't be used in the offhand, limiting them to single-handed or dual-wielded options.
epicfight.tip.skill_books: Skills are found in dungeon books or sporadically drop from hostile mobs, categorized into Dodge, Guard, Mobility, Revelation, and Passive.
epicfight.tip.sweeping_edge: Sweeping Edge enchantment increases weapon innate skill damage in proportion to its level:: level 1 by 50%, level 2 by 67%, and level 3 by 75%.
epicfight.tip.sharpness: The Sharpness enchantment augments the damage inflicted by every type of attack.
epicfight.tip.impact: Impact increases the total stun time for the target hit.
epicfight.tip.blocking: While blocking a hit, you get stunned for a short time.
epicfight.tip.parrying: To learn the Parrying skill, you must first acquire the Guard skill.
epicfight.tip.death_harvest: Death Harvest allows you to refill weapon charge on weapon innate skill, based on weapon damage and enemies defeated
epicfight.tip.demolition_leap: To acquire Demolition Leap, you must defeat the Ender Dragon.
epicfight.tip.temples: Uchigatanas, akin to skill books, can be discovered in Desert Temples or Jungle Temples. These rare weapons are not craftable.
epicfight.tip.combat_mode: Switch between mining and combat modes by pressing it's default key, 'R'.
epicfight.tip.weapon_charge: Your weapon will be charged up when you strike entities. You can use weapon innate skill when weapon charge is full
epicfight.tip.weapon_innate: Each weapon has its innate skill. You can execute a skill with a weapon innate keybind
datapack_edit.model_player.trail.tooltip: Defines a trail effect information of an animation.
datapack_edit.import_animation.place_too: Drag & drop the animation files you want to import here.
datapack_edit.import_animation.type.tool: Defines a type of an animation
datapack_edit.import_animation.convert_t: Defines a transition time of an animation.
datapack_edit.import_animation.phases.to: Defines attack phases of an animation
datapack_edit.import_animation.repeat.to: Defines if an animation should be played repeatedly
datapack_edit.import_animation.antic.too:
Defines anticipation time.

0 ~ anticipation: an entity can rotate but can't move
datapack_edit.import_animation.pre_delay:
Defines pre-delay time.

anticipation ~ pre-delay: an entity can't rotate and can't move
datapack_edit.import_animation.contact.t:
Defines contact time.

pre-delay ~ contact: an entity can't rotate and can't move. Hurts all colliding entities
Defines recovery time.

contact ~ recovery: an entity can't rotate and can't move

recovery ~ EoA: an entity can move canceling this animation
datapack_edit.import_animation.hand.tool: Defines a hand to get an item in a current phase
Defines a collider of an animation. If you define no collider here, it will get collider from item capability.
(optional)
datapack_edit.import_animation.joint.too: Defines a parent joint of collider
datapack_edit.import_animation.client_da: Defines advanced settings used in client (optional)

Defines a layer type

Base: Consists a base pose and always visible.

Composite: Visibilities are affected by the priority and join mask.

Multilayer: Split an animation into base and composite layers which are played at the same time.

Defines a priority of an animation.
Composite layers with lower priority than a base layer priority will be ignored.
Defines a joint mask set that decides visibilities for each joint
Defines an starting time of a trail effect in an animation time
Defines an end time of a trail effect in an animation time
Defines a parent joint of a trail effect
datapack_edit.collider.tooltip:
Defines a collider of a weapon. Get from the collider registry or define a custom one
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.item_capability.collider.t:
Defines a collider of a weapon. Will apply a collider from a weapon type if this is empty
(optional)
datapack_edit.collider.count.tooltip:
A number of colliders interpolated between a previous and current pose
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.collider.size.tooltip:
Size of a collider (Only positive values are allowed)
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.weapon_type.hit_particle.t:
Defines a particle effect when an entity is hit by a weapon
(optional)
datapack_edit.weapon_type.hit_sound.tool:
Defines a sound when entity's hit by a weapon
(optional)
datapack_edit.weapon_type.swing_sound.to:
Defines a sound when wielding a weapon
(optional)
datapack_edit.weapon_type.styles.tooltip:
Weapon styles based on a player's state, Used by combo and living animations
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.weapon_type.offhand_valida: Defines visibility of offhand items when holding a weapon with a style that offhand is unavailable
datapack_edit.weapon_type.innate_skill.t: Defines innate skills of a weapon
datapack_edit.weapon_type.living_animati: Defines living animations overrided by a weapon
Defines overrided animations when holding a weapon
datapack_edit.weapon_type.styles.conditi: Defines conditions that determine when a player have this style
datapack_edit.weapon_type.combos.combo_a:
Defines combo attacks of a weapon
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.weapon_type.combos.dash_at:
Defines a dash attack of a weapon
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.weapon_type.combos.air_sla:
Defines a jump attack of a weapon
(mandatory)
Defines if an item is armor or weapon
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.item_capability.type.toolt:
Defines a weapon type of an item
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.item_capability.trail.tool:
Defines a trail effect information of an item
(optional)
datapack_edit.item_capability.color.tool:
Defines color of a trail effect
(mandatory)
Defines a start point of a trail effect
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.item_capability.end_pos.to:
Defines an edge of a trail effect
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.item_capability.lifetime.t:
Defines a lifetime of a trail effect. Applied to each parts
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.item_capability.interpolat:
Defines a number of interpolate points created in each ticks
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.item_capability.texture_pa:
Defines a texture of a trail effect
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.item_capability.particle_t:
Defines a particle type of a trail effect
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.mob_patch.humanoid.tooltip:
Defines if an entity is human based or not
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.mob_patch.faction.tooltip:
Defines a faction of an entity. Mobs that have the same factions don't hurt each other
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.mob_patch.swing_sound.tool:
Defines a swing sound when an entity holds nothing in hands
(optional)
datapack_edit.mob_patch.hit_sound.toolti:
Defines a hit sound when an entity holds nothing in hands
(optional)
datapack_edit.mob_patch.hit_particle.too:
Defines a hit particle when an entity holds nothing in hands
(optional)
datapack_edit.mob_patch.default_livingmo:
Defines living animations of an entity
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.mob_patch.humanoid_weapon_:
Defines living animations when entity holds a specific weapon
(mandatory)
Defines stun animations of an entity
(mandatory)
Defines attack movesets of an entity
(mandatory)
datapack_edit.mob_patch.humanoid_weapon_: Defines weapon categories that own a living animation set
Defines a style of weapon categories
Defines living animations based on weapon categories and its style
Defines a chance to select this behavior
Defines cooldown ticks of a moveset
Defines if this moveset can be canceled by another moveset
Defines if a moveset is looping. The combo counter will not be reset if looping is true
Defines conditions to execute an attack movement
epicfight.messages.shader_transform_fail: Failed to create shader %s. Automatically switches animation shader mode off.
